eeth kohoma kohoma hari parakku una..eeth dan hadisiye mathak une mekath danna oona neda kiyala...me pinthure thiyenne mage fon eke kamarawen gaththa chayarupa thunak kapala ekathu karala hadapu eka chayarupayak...mokada man wena wenama me chayarupa aplod karanna giyanan me tika pili welata ganna baha..ehema pili welata ganna widiya man thama danne naha..ee hinda danna oona pili welata man ekathu kala..me lagadi dawasaka man kalin wada karapu thana rajakariyakata mata yanna una withthiya man meyita kalin post eheka dala athi..me eda ra ehedi gaththa poto kali tikak thama...ape aarakshaka anshaye sewayata aluthin gaththa aarakshaka niladhari mahaththayek wisin ema sthanaye athi rathri mura sanchara pothe dala thibunu satahan dekak thama me...nikan inna gaman pothpath tika pariksha karanakota mata ahu une...eya wage satahan hariyata ahuwenawa unath..me eeye pereda aawa unnahe tikak amuthuma aakarayakata meka liyala thiyenawa dakkama mata hithuna meka kattiyata pennanna honda satahanak kiyala...eekayi aragena aawe...ee aayathana bhumiya akkara ganak thiyena thanak..ithin rata payen payata wate yanna oona..ee eka watayak kilo mitarayak withara thiyenawa..nikan neweyi wela satahan yanthraya naththan sinhalen panchin mashin eka kiyala api ketiyen adunwana podi pettiyak wage ehekuth aran thama yanne..
